contact.text: You can find me in Linz, on Twitter or you can just write me an email at hallo@laraamalia.at.

meta.description: Hello, my name is Lara Amalia. I’m a web developer by day and a musician by night.
meta.title: Lara Amalia. Web developer & musician.

misc.cat: I have a cat called Gandalf (the white).
misc.maryHarry: I like Mary Poppins and Harry Potter, the books as well as the movies.
misc.running: When I feel like freeing up my mind, I enjoy going for a run.
misc.sea: My favourite colour is blue, maybe that’s because I’m in love with the sea.

intro.text1:
I started singing when I was a small child. I have been playing the violin since I was five years old. Later I learned to play the piano. Recently I started taking cello lessons.
I love it.
intro.text2: As a singer/songwriter I write songs in Upper Austrian dialect. I’m also a singer in a vocal ensemble called

music.subHeader: my life has always been full of music and will always be

intro.text1: I built my first websites with table layouts and framesets and using image maps for site navigation.
intro.text2: Since then I have learned a lot. I studied Media Technology and Design (FH Hagenberg) and Computer Science (JKU Linz).

web.subHeader: When I was 12 years old I read a book about HTML and started building websites
